Description: A unique identifier for this education entry.
The name of the school where the member studied.
The field that the member studied while at this school.
A date object containing the 'year' that the student began studying at this school.
A date object containing the 'year' that the student finished studying at this school.
The degree received at this school (if any).
A brief summary of activities the member participated in while at this school.
A brief summary of other details related to the member's studies at this school.
